subject: Sales
title: The Real Reason People Buy
description: A quick win: understand The Real Reason People Buy.

hook.text: You think buyers want your product. They don't. They want the better life it promises.

buildup.text: Every purchase is an emotional bet that life will improve after clicking 'buy now.'

discovery.text: Neuroscience shows 95% of decisions happen below conscious awareness. Logic arrives after.

twist.text: That's why data dumps fail. No one ever bought a product because the spec sheet was exciting.

climax.text: Top sellers describe life after the purchase. They sell the destination, not the vehicle.

punchline.text: People buy better futures, not better features.

quiz.question: What percentage of buying decisions happen subconsciously?
